channel.title: Agent Economy
channel.description: Curated news and insights about AI agents and the autonomous economy | 关于 AI 智能体和自主经济的精选洞察

item.title: AI Hires Humans: A New Paradigm in the Agent Economy | AI 雇佣人类：智能体经济的新范式
item.description: Rent a Human introduces a disruptive concept where AI agents hire humans for physical tasks... / Rent a Human 提出颠覆性概念：AI 智能体雇佣人类完成物理任务...

item.title: Google Announced Agent Payments Protocol (AP2) | Google 发布 Agent Payments Protocol (AP2)
item.description: Google announced AP2, an open protocol built on A2A that enables secure payment transactions between AI agents... / Google 发布 AP2 协议，一个建立在 A2A 之上的开放标准，支持 AI 智能体之间的安全支付交易...

item.title: Google Introduces A2A Protocol: A New Era of Agent Interoperability | Google 推出 A2A 协议：智能体互操作的新时代
item.description: Google announces A2A open protocol enabling agents from different frameworks and vendors to collaborate... / Google 宣布 A2A 开放协议，让不同框架和供应商的智能体能够协作...

item.title: Anthropic Introduces Model Context Protocol (MCP) | Anthropic 发布 Model Context Protocol (MCP)
item.description: Anthropic open-sources MCP, an open standard connecting AI assistants to data systems... / Anthropic 开源 MCP，一个连接 AI 助手与数据系统的开放标准...
